definition: to conform (with)/to echo/to correlate well/(linguistics) agreement
to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: Those opinions and propositions were agreed upon and echoed by many participating leaders.
sentences.chinese: 這些觀點和主張得到許多與會領導人的贊同和呼應。

sentences.english: The drum of water current concuss , in the heart of aery absentminded, exactly is who is act in cooperation who?
sentences.chinese: 水流的鼓盪，心中的飄渺恍惚，到底是誰在呼應着誰？

sentences.english: Naive gatehouse stand in bluestone steps, tile-roofed house with the door tall and echoes.
sentences.chinese: 素樸的門樓立在青石臺階上，同門內高大瓦房相呼應。

sentences.english: The film is in lurid colors, a pulp counterpoint to the elegance of the action.
sentences.chinese: 影片的色彩濃的逼人，森森鬼氣呼應着優雅的動作。

sentences.english: These comments echo the idea that space exploration is our Manifest Destiny.
sentences.chinese: 這些評論呼應的想法認爲太空探索是我們註定的命運。

sentences.english: Golden color is picked to symbolize wealth, in consistency with the financial media properties of ones.
sentences.chinese: 使用象徵財富的金色，呼應金融媒體鉅亨網的特質。

sentences.english: Paul finished this epistle right where he began.
sentences.chinese: 保羅以首尾呼應的方式，來結束這封書信。

sentences.english: Especially i felt this when i made any attempt to propitiate him .
sentences.chinese: 我想撫慰他時尤其感到這點，我的同情得不到呼應。

sentences.english: I have told you of her attempts to propitiate M.
sentences.chinese: 我想撫慰他時尤其感到這點，我的同情得不到呼應。

sentences.english: The difference between these three techniques is the different ways of the tone and mood correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 三種呼應的區別在於呼應中聲氣感應的方法不同。

sentences.english: The difference between these three techniques is the different ways of the tone and mood correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 三種呼應的區別在於呼應中聲氣感應的方法不同。

sentences.english: The rumble of distant thunder seemed to echo my inner turmoil.
sentences.chinese: 遠處轟鳴的雷聲似乎在呼應我內心的混亂。

sentences.english: "I, too, " echoed the buttercup, the cornflower, the poppy, and the clover.
sentences.chinese: “我也”，呼應了毛茛的矢車菊，罌粟和三葉草。

sentences.english: Each half reaction responds to the interfacial potential at the corresponding electrode .
sentences.chinese: 每個半反應都與相應電極上的界面電勢差相呼應。

sentences.english: The prelude and coda echo from beginning to end.

definition: to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious
to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
to run through/a connecting thread from beginning to end/to link
